title: Rune Collector
body:
In the mission called Rune Collector it says that I have to play one matchmade game so I did it but it didnt say that the mission had been completed.
Can someone help me with this please.

replies.body: look through another similar post like yours. l had the same issue about getting the blue essence reward if that is what you mean. apparently it is stored in your loot tab, so you need to open something to get the blue essence

Did you dc/afk/remake or leave early at any point? Any of these things count as you not having actually played the game and so won't complete the mission.

"Matchmade" also doesn't include bot games if that is at all relevant, even though you are technically matched with other players.
